body:
Trying to fetch a key from a build cache takes an absurd amount of time, if the cache has a significant number of packages:

```
$> spack mirror add e4s https://instinct.nic.uoregon.edu:8083/e4s
$> spack buildcache keys -it
.....
many many minutes of waiting before key is retrieved
```

Since the keys are listed under `index.html` with extension `.key` -- it makes no sense why this operation would depend, in any significant way, on the number of packages in the cache.

Using Spack @ develop (commit 5df9dd2b48)
title: buildcache keys: fetching key from cache takes absurd amount of time
